name: Johnny Yin
description: '''Johnny Yin''' ({{lang-zh|殷正洋|t=殷正洋|p=Yīn Zhèngyáng|w=Yin Cheng-yang}}; born {{Birth date|1961|1|23|df=yes}}) is a Taiwanese singer and host. Born in [[Taipei]], [[Taiwan]], Yin has won three [[Golden Melody Awards]] for Best Male Mandarin Singer. He has also won the [[Golden Tripod]] and two [[Golden Bell Awards]], earning him the name "Three Gold Singer". Yin is known for his thick and stentorian singing voice.
